Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndipo iye adakhala ndi pakati ndipo adapita kumalo akutali
Ndipo ululu wa kubereka udamubwerera pamene adali patsinde pa mtengo wa tende ndipo adalira nati, “Kalanga ine, bola ndikadangofa zisanachitike izi chifukwa ndikadakhala woiwalidwa.”
Kudabwera mawu kuchokera pansi oti: “Usadandaule ayi. Ambuye wako wakukonzera ka mtsinje kamene kalikuyenda ku mapazi ako.”
“Ndipo gwedeza mtengo watendewu, iwo udzagwetsa zipatso za tende zaziwisi ndi zakupsa.”
“Idya ndi umwe, kotero sangalala.” Ndipo ukakumana ndi munthu wina aliyense muuze kuti, “Ine ndalumbira kwa Mwini chisoni kusala chakudya ndipo sindidzayankhula ndi munthu wina aliyense lero.”
Ndipo iye adatenga mwana wake nanka naye kwa anthu ake amene adati kwa iye’ “Iwe Maria! Ndithudi iwe wabweretsa chinthu cha chilendo.”
“Iwe mlongo wake wa Aroni! Atate wako sanali munthu wochita zoipa ndiponso Amayi ako sadali a chiwerewere.”
Maria adamuloza iye. Koma iwo adati, “Kodi ife tingayankhule ndi mwana wam’chikuta bwanji?”
Mwanayo adati, “Ine ndine kapolo wa Mulungu. Iye wandipatsa ine Buku labwino ndipo wandisankha kukhala Mtumwi.”
“Madalitso ake ali pa ine kulikonse kumene ndingapite ndipo wandilamulira kuti ndikhale wopemphera ndi kupereka chaulere kwa anthu osauka nthawi yonse ya moyo wanga.”
“Iye wandilamula kuti ndizilemekeza amayi anga ndipo sadandipange kukhala wamwano ndi woipa.”
Ndipo mtendere ukhale kwa ine patsiku limene ndidabadwa, ndi patsiku limene ndidzafa ndiponso pa tsiku limene ndidzaukitsidwa kwa akufa
Ameneyo ndiye Yesu, mwana wa Maria. Liwu loonadi limene iwo ali kukayika
Sizili zoyenera kuti Mulungu akhale ndi mwana wamwamuna! Iye ayeretsedwe ku zimenezo. Ngati Iye afuna chinthu, Iye amangonena kuti, “Chikhale” ndipo chimakhaladi
Ndithudi Mulungu ndi Ambuye wanga ndiponso Ambuye wanu. Kotero mpembedzeni Iye yekha. Imeneyo ndiyo njira
Koma magulu a Akhirisitu adasemphana maganizo pakati pawo. Koma pamene tsiku loopsa lidza, tsoka kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Kodi iwo adzaona ndi kumva momveka bwanji pa tsiku limene adzaonekera pa maso pathu! Koma anthu ochita zoipa lero ali mu chisokonezo choonekeratu
Achenjeze za tsiku limene adzanong’oneza bombono, pamene malamulo athu adzakwaniritsidwa ndipo pamene iwo ali nkuiwala ndi kusakhulupirira
Ndithudi Ife tidzatenga dziko lapansi ndi onse amene amakhala m’menemo. Ndi kwa Ife kumene onse adzabwezedwa
Ndipo kumbukira nkhani ya Abrahamu imene ili m’Buku. Iye adali Mtumwi ndi munthu wangwiro
Pamene iye adawauza bambo wake kuti, “Oh Abambo! Kodi inu mungalambire bwanji chinthu chimene sichingathe kumva, kuona kapena kukuthandizani pa chilichonse?”
“Ohabambo! Choonadichavumbulutsidwa kwa ine chimene sichinakufikireni inu. Kotero nditsatireni ine kuti ndikutsogolereni ku njira yoyenera.”
“oh abambo! Musamapembedze Satana. Ndithudi Satana adanyoza Ambuye wachisoni chosatha.”
“oh abambo! Ine ndili kuopa kuti chilango cha Mulungu chidzadza pa inu ndipo mudzakhala bwenzi la Satana.”
Abambo ake adati, “Kodi ukudana ndi milungu yanga iwe Abrahamu? Ukapanda kusiya ndidzakuponya miyala ndipo unditalikire pa kanthawi kochepa.”
Abrahamu adati, “Mtendere ukhale kwa inu. Ine ndidzapempha Ambuye wanga kuti akukhululukireni popeza, Mulungu, kwa ine, ndi wokoma mtima.”
“Ine ndikuchokerani ndi zimene mumapembedza kuonjezera pa Mulungu. Ine ndidzapempha kwa Ambuye wanga ndipo ndikhulupirira kuti popembedza Ambuye wanga ndisadzakhale watsoka
Ndipo pamene Abrahamu adasiya anthu ake ndi mafano amene iwo anali kupembedza kuonjezera pa Mulungu, tidamupatsa Isake ndi Yakobo. Aliyense wa iwo tidamupanga kukhala Mtumwi
Ndipo tidawapatsa onse mituka kuchokera m’chifundo chathu ndipo tidawapanga iwo kukhala otchulidwa mwaulemu
Ndipo kumbukira nkhani ya Mose imene ili m’Buku, amene adali wosankhidwa ndiponso Mtumwi ndi Mneneri
Ife tidamuitana kuchokera kumbali ya dzanja la manja la phiri la Sinai ndipo tinamuyandikitsa kukhala pafupi ndi Ife kuti tiyankhule naye mwamseri
Tidamupatsa, mwachisoni chathu, m’bale wake Aroni kuti akhale Mtumwi
Ndipo kumbukira nkhani ya Ishimayeli imene ili m’Buku. Iye adali wosunga pangano ndipo adali Mtumwi ndi Mneneri
Iye anali kulamula anthu ake kuchita mapemphero ndi kupereka chothandiza nacho anthu osauka ndipo adali, kwa Ambuye wake, wokondedwa
Ndipo kumbukira za Idrissa. Iye adali munthu wonena zoona ndi Mtumwi
Ife tidamukweza kukhala malo a pamwamba

Awa ndi anthu amene Mulungu adawaonetsera chisomo chake. Atumwi ochokera ku m’badwo wa Adamu ndi iwo amene tidawatenga pamodzi m’chombo ndi Nowa. Ana a Abrahamu, a Israyeli ndi iwo amene Ife tawatsogolera ndi kuwasankha. Pamene zivumbulutso za Mwini chisoni chosatha zinali kulakatulidwa kwa iwo, iwo adali kugwa nkhope zawo pansi ndi kumalira
